Blog.post: Last summer, we went on a " Last Day of Summer-Vacation " trip to ZOOZ. Although the day wuz kinda wet and muggy, we had tonza fun fishing, seeing all the animals, going on the TRAM, and most of all, paddle-boating! All in all, we had mad fun... unfortunately, though, school started the very next day....
urlLink Me, Anjana, and Aneetha in the van on the way to ZOOZ! urlLink
urlLink "YASMIN'S GROUP"...lol ;) urlLink
urlLink All of us kids....just after Adri threw the tennis ball IN the monkey's cage... for the second time ! urlLink
urlLink Awww! Adri's got the cheesiest smile!! urlLink
urlLink The TRAM.....geez, how many times did we go on that thing?! urlLink
urlLink Datz me, about to go paddle-boating with Anjana urlLink
urlLink Mark and Vijai...notice the obvious tilt of the boat...lol....Mark, man, gain sum weight! urlLink

Well, my "Sweet 16" is finally over, and now I'm slowly inching up to adulthood ...........what could be more scary!!! Anyway, I gotta say that the little b'day party we had for my mom 'n me wuz a whole lot've fun! Since it was about 3 months ago, I can't really remember all that we did (getting old, remember?) but we did play soccer at the park and my team won! ...and the guyz played b-ball, while the adults sat around, ate, talked, took pics.... and wutever! I got a lot of presents (..... yeah! ...) but what really counted was that all my loved ones were around to celebrate the coming year along with me! (Awww!) Anyway, I'll "sut ^" now so that you can view the pics.....
urlLink Group Picture taken just before we cut the cake urlLink
urlLink Me and my CUTE lil cousins...Adrian, Baby Sherine, and Rachel urlLink
urlLink Debbie, Jessica, Anjana, me, Angela, and Aneetha urlLink

urlLink Anjana, Rosy, and Jessica.... the rock stars... urlLink
urlLink *~ HOMIEZ "4" LYPHE! ~* urlLink
urlLink Krys, Me, Kelly, Gloria, Rebekah, and Angie at Ohio Convention 2003 urlLink
urlLink My sister, Angie! urlLink
urlLink I believe in angels, the kind that heaven sends. I'm surrounded by angels, but I call them my best friends. urlLink
urlLink A day without a friend is like a pot without a single drop of honey left inside. - Winnie the Pooh urlLink
urlLink My friends from DC and NJ....(L to R) Tracy, Krystal, Becky, (me), Grace, and Job urlLink
urlLink ...There is a friend who sticks closer than a brother... urlLink
urlLink ...I PROMISE... urlLink
...There is a friend who sticks closer than a brother...

This page is dedicated to all my friends, both new and old. Jus wanna say how much I appreciate every single one of you and that you guyz all mean soooo much to me! ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~ What's Tommy without Chuckie , What's Steve without Blue , What's Spongebob without Patrick , It's me without you."
